Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Westbound Reroute near 57th/Museum
ShortDescription: WB 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Everett, 56th, Everett and 55th due to, street blockage near 57th/Museum.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Everett, 56th, Everett and 55th due to, street blockage near 57th/Museum.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Southbound Reroute near Damen/21st
ShortDescription: Southbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/21st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt, and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/21st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
